editorialNotes.standard: Years ago, Plants vs. Zombies defined a genre with its fresh concept, undeniable charm, and innovative, balanced gameplay. Now the undead have risen again, bringing with them new time-traveling tales and a massive slew of new zombies and plants. Whether you stomp enemies without paying a dime or buy new experimental plants and power-ups with In-App Purchases, the result is the same: an incredible sequel that's fresh and fun throughout, reminding us why we fell in love with this world in the first place.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Kill the dead to stop Doomsday

editorialNotes.standard: Deciphering this game is no easy taskit feels like a metaphor. Is it a commentary on the fragile nature of trust and human connection? A scathing critique of our blind adherence to authority? Or is it just really weird? Regardless, INSIDE is an incredible journey with increasingly bizarre encounters that mix action with clever puzzle designs. The game isnt meant to be entirely understood. Its meant to be experienced.

It's back! Sprint for the leaderboards in the sequel to one of the App Store's most popular endless runners, which arrives with a host of fabulous improvements, from overhauled graphics to refined controls, original minecart and zip-line challenges, and much more.

editorialNotes.standard: Elemental magic rules the land of Teyvat in the remarkable Genshin Impactand as a powerful Traveler, you put this power to good use. Vibrant visual effects transform elemental blasts of fire, ice, and lightning into jaw-dropping spectacles. But its not just a looker: Genshin Impacts beautiful open world is filled with thrilling quests and fascinating secrets. Climb mountains, cook meals, and soar through the skies as you search for your lost siblingor simply get lost in Teyvat and see what happens.
editorialNotes.short: Explore a new land, and meet amazing new characters.

editorialNotes.standard: Daredevil. Storm. Juggernaut. Vision. Kabams beautiful brawler gives you control of dozens of beloved heroes and villains as you punch, kick, and blast your way across the Marvel universe. A simple and intuitive set of attacks, counters, and special attacks make for edge-of-your-seat combat, but youll spend just as much time finding and upgrading your super-team. Figuring out the best way to use them is key to surviving bouts with relentless opponentsand progressing through treacherous story quests.

Star Wars and toys go together like Wookiees and smugglers, but rarely so well as they do in these classic LEGO adventures. Theyre all herethe most beloved characters, settings, and vehicles from the first six films, lovingly translated into plastic bricks for a wacky reenactment of George Lucass epic space odyssey. Thanks to instantly accessible controls and hours of action-packed gameplay, fans of all ages can jump in and relive their favorite scenes.

name: Level Devil - NOT A Troll Game

editorialNotes.standard: One-eyed giant eels? Alien-like anglerfish? Youll be shocked at your haul in this creepy, Lovecraftian fishing game.
This parkour-packed take on the beloved adventure franchise is bursting with fast-paced combat, gorgeous visuals, and a deep dive into Persian mythology.

editorialNotes.standard: Well be fossilized before we get through all the content packed into this impressive mobile version of the dino-taming survival favorite.
In this gruesome 2D platformer, youre the monster! Grow your creepy blob by breaking through doors and snacking on evil scientists.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Liberty City Stories shows off one of gamings most memorable worlds while taking you on an action-packed tour of a criminal underworld. Stealing cars, evading cops, and racing through streets littered with obstacles is an absolute blast. Gaining notoriety while amassing new cars and weapons is as addictive as ever, and the franchises familiar dark humor had us laughing out loud. Rockstar's enormous game offers a wonderful sandbox filled with chaos and silliness, and you wont want to leave it.

editorialNotes.tagline: Evolve your dinos in lush landscapes
editorialNotes.standard: This breathtaking game mixes tycoon-style park management with electrifying dino-on-dino battles, starring characters and critters from the blockbuster movie. We love tinkering with our dinosaur DNA to evolve our thunder lizards into more powerful specimens while also expanding our dream parks high-tech facilities. When it comes time to test your dinosaurs mettle in the arena, strength and strategy are the keys to prehistoric pugilist victories. And luckily, the Indominus rex stays inside her cage. For now.

editorialNotes.tagline: In your world, you are the hero

editorialNotes.standard: Rec Room is a sprawling, vibrant universe of wildly different multiplayer experiences, which makes it easy to find whatever were in the mood for. We can play paintball, slay monsters in dungeons, or simply hang out with friends on a moonlit island beachand so much more. But its not all about playing: Rec Room lets us make things too. With intuitive tools for creating and sharing our own experiences, Rec Room provides a fantastic way to turn imagination into digital reality.
Hit the slopes! Ski and snowboard through an action-packed sequel featuring bigger jumps, huge resorts, and a gorgeous open world.

name: BOWBLITZ
artistName: Hong Kong Kaboom Technology Co., Limited

editorialNotes.standard: An unforgettable RPG with cinematic turn-based battles and a captivating story.
editorialNotes.short: Hop on the Astral Express and live interplanetary adventures.

editorialNotes.standard: A comet has struck Mount Boom, and its up to you to assemble a quintet of adorable fiends to stave off a slimy slug invasion. Best Fiends is a unique take on the classic item-matching puzzler. Your team of canny critters will launch attacks, power up special abilities, and uncover hidden goodies across dozens of levels. From tricky obstacles to devastating special moves, theres plenty of strategy among the silliness.
Cowabunga! Take down foes as Casey Jones, April ONeil, and the turtle gang in this old-school beat-em-up.
Crack the case of a missing teenager using clues hidden in her phone in this suspenseful mystery.
